Russia.full_name: Трубы стальные бесшовные для котлов и трубопроводов высокого давления
Russia.notes: ГОСТ 550 covers seamless steel tubes for boilers and high-pressure pipelines with similar temperature and pressure applications. Material grades like 20, 12Х1МФ, 15Х5М have comparable properties to JIS G3467 STF grades.

China.notes: GB/T 5310 covers seamless steel tubes for high-pressure boilers with similar material grades (20G, 15CrMoG, 12Cr1MoVG) and application scope for fired heaters and high-temperature service.

Europe.full_name: Seamless steel tubes for pressure purposes - Technical delivery conditions - Part 2: Non-alloy and alloy steel tubes with specified elevated temperature properties
Europe.notes: EN 10216-2 covers seamless steel tubes for pressure purposes with elevated temperature properties. Material grades like P235GH, P265GH, 10CrMo9-10 are functionally equivalent for fired heater applications.

GOST_to_GB.notes: ГОСТ and GB standards share common heritage with similar design approaches, safety factors (1.5-2.6), and dimensional systems. Material grades have direct equivalents with comparable chemical compositions and mechanical properties.

GOST_to_EN.notes: ГОСТ and EN have different safety factors (ГОСТ: 1.5-2.6 vs EN: 2.4-3.0) leading to potential wall thickness differences. Dimensional compatibility requires verification, especially for flange connections and bolt patterns.

GB_to_EN.notes: GB and EN standards have different design philosophies and safety factors. While functionally similar for high-temperature applications, dimensional verification and pressure rating confirmation are required before interchange.

recommendations: Ensure detailed engineering analysis when substituting ГОСТ/GB to EN standards.
Verify dimensional compatibility through mockups or detailed drawings before finalizing replacements.
Consult with experts for critical applications, especially in high-pressure or safety-critical environments.
